column1: Uchi////Rolls: Ham/Egg Roll was amazing.  At first I was a bit surprised at the name of the roll
column2: but it was crispy pork belly in a roll with some type of egg sauce
column3: and if this was a breakfast item somewhere it would be the next breakfast place like Breakfast Klub's Chicken & Waffles.  Common
column4: PORK BELLY. YOM!  Also had the Wagyu Beef Roll
column5: and of course it was delicious; there really isn't anything bad when it comes to wagyu beef.
